statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 12 \\ 16 \\ 16 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -24 \\ 28 \\ 32 \\ 40 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
